cu.explanation_en: Setting SCTP output streams to 0 will cause SCTP connection establishment failure between CU and DU, preventing F1 interface setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting force 256QAM off to an invalid value (2) will cause modulation configuration errors and prevent proper downlink transmission.
du.explanation_zh: 將強制 256QAM 關閉設定為無效值 (2)，會導致調製配置錯誤，並阻止正確的下行鏈路傳輸。
